price: آیا انسان ته نه دي یاد چې یقینا موږ له دې مخکې پیدا کړی و او دې هیڅ نه و.
arabic: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
